title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for one correct identification.
descriptions: The response does not correctly identify any one of the following architectural or technological features of the rural landscape shown in the photograph.
The response identifies ONE of the following architectural or technological features of the rural landscape shown in the photograph:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for one correct identification.
descriptions: The response does not correctly identify any one of the following architectural or technological feature of the urban landscape shown in the photograph.
The response identifies ONE of the following architectural or technological feature of the urban landscape shown in the photograph:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct description.
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe how a country’s physical landscape influences its cultural landscape by stating one of the following.
The response correctly describes how a country’s physical landscape influences its cultural landscape by stating one of the following.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct description.
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe a type of technology shown in one or both of the photographs.
The response correctly describes one of the following types of technology shown in one or both of the photographs.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct explanation.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain how the technology shown in both photographs affected land-use patterns in the Netherlands by stating both of the following.
The response correctly explains how the technology shown in the photographs affected land-use patterns in the Netherlands by stating both of the following.

title: Part F
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct explanation.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain how the cultural landscape shown in one or both of the photographs conveys a local sense of place by stating one of the following
The response correctly explains how the cultural landscape shown in one or both of the photographs conveys a local sense of place by stating one of the following.
